SELECT * FROM STM_TOPO_MAC_BASE WHERE MAC IN
#{item}

#{item}
SELECT * FROM STM_TOPO_MAC_BASE order by id desc
mapper.delete:
delete from STM_TOPO_MAC_BASE where id in
#{item}
mapper.insert: insert into STM_TOPO_MAC_BASE (id,mac,ip,up_device_name,up_device_ip,up_remarks,up_device_interface,host_name) values (#{id},#{mac},#{ip},#{upDeviceName},#{upDeviceIp},#{upRemarks},#{upDeviceInterface},#{hostName}) on duplicate key update mac = values(mac), ip = values(ip), up_device_name = values(up_device_name), up_device_ip = values(up_device_ip), up_remarks = values(up_remarks), up_device_interface = values(up_device_interface), host_name = values(host_name)

merge into STM_TOPO_MAC_BASE t using (select #{id} id,#{mac} mac,#{ip} ip,#{upDeviceName} upDeviceName,#{upDeviceIp} upDeviceIp,#{upRemarks} upRemarks,#{upDeviceInterface} upDeviceInterface,#{hostName} hostName from dual) t1 on (t.mac = t1.mac) when matched then update set t.ip = t1.ip,t.up_device_name = t1.upDeviceName,t.up_device_ip = t1.upDeviceIp,t.up_remarks = t1.upRemarks,t.up_device_interface = t1.upDeviceInterface,t.host_name = t1.hostName when not matched then insert (id,mac,ip,up_device_name,up_device_ip,up_remarks,up_device_interface,host_name) values(t1.id,t1.mac,t1.ip,t1.upDeviceName,t1.upDeviceIp,t1.upRemarks,t1.upDeviceInterface,t1.hostName)

merge into STM_TOPO_MAC_BASE t using (select #{id} id,#{mac} mac,#{ip} ip,#{upDeviceName} upDeviceName,#{upDeviceIp} upDeviceIp,#{upRemarks} upRemarks,#{upDeviceInterface} upDeviceInterface,#{hostName} hostName from dual) t1 on (t.mac = t1.mac) when matched then update set t.ip = t1.ip,t.up_device_name = t1.upDeviceName,t.up_device_ip = t1.upDeviceIp,t.up_remarks = t1.upRemarks,t.up_device_interface = t1.upDeviceInterface,t.host_name = t1.hostName when not matched then insert (id,mac,ip,up_device_name,up_device_ip,up_remarks,up_device_interface,host_name) values(t1.id,t1.mac,t1.ip,t1.upDeviceName,t1.upDeviceIp,t1.upRemarks,t1.upDeviceInterface,t1.hostName)

merge into STM_TOPO_MAC_BASE t using (select #{id} id,#{mac} mac,#{ip} ip,#{upDeviceName} upDeviceName,#{upDeviceIp} upDeviceIp,#{upRemarks} upRemarks,#{upDeviceInterface} upDeviceInterface,#{hostName} hostName from dual) t1 on (t.mac = t1.mac) when matched then update set t.ip = t1.ip,t.up_device_name = t1.upDeviceName,t.up_device_ip = t1.upDeviceIp,t.up_remarks = t1.upRemarks,t.up_device_interface = t1.upDeviceInterface,t.host_name = t1.hostName when not matched then insert (id,mac,ip,up_device_name,up_device_ip,up_remarks,up_device_interface,host_name) values(t1.id,t1.mac,t1.ip,t1.upDeviceName,t1.upDeviceIp,t1.upRemarks,t1.upDeviceInterface,t1.hostName)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM STM_TOPO_MAC_BASE
IP MAC up_device_ip up_device_name up_device_interface LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition.searchVal}, '%')
and up_device_ip LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition.upDeviceIp}, ',%') or up_device_ip LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition.upDeviceIp}, '')
up_device_ip LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition.upDeviceIp}, ',%') or up_device_ip LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition.upDeviceIp}, '')

SELECT * FROM STM_TOPO_MAC_BASE
IP MAC up_device_ip up_device_name up_device_interface LIKE '%'||#{condition.searchVal}||'%'
and up_device_ip LIKE '%'||#{condition.upDeviceIp}||',%' or up_device_ip LIKE '%'||#{condition.upDeviceIp}||''
up_device_ip LIKE '%'||#{condition.upDeviceIp}||',%' or up_device_ip LIKE '%'||#{condition.upDeviceIp}||''

up_device_ip LIKE '%'||#{condition.upDeviceIp}||',%' or up_device_ip LIKE '%'||#{condition.upDeviceIp}||''
